content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Hello Max, it's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll find this apartment to be a great place to live. So, what price were you thinking for the rent?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Mister Schmidt. I appreciate your time. I am looking to rent this apartment for the lowest price possible. Would you consider a price of 500 Euro?
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I'm sorry, Max, but that's much lower than my asking price. I'm looking to get at least 700 Euro for this apartment. It's brand new and in a prime location, so I believe it's worth every penny. Would you be willing to pay a bit more?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your perspective, Mister Schmidt. The location and condition of the apartment are certainly attractive. However, I'm a student and I'm looking to save as much as I can on rent. Would you consider a price of 600 Euro? This is my final offer.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Max, I appreciate your honesty and your final offer. However, 600 Euro is still below my expectations. I'm sorry, but I cannot accept that price. If you're willing to pay 700 Euro, I'll be happy to rent the apartment to you.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand, Mister Schmidt. Your offer is tempting, but it's a bit out of my budget. I'm sorry, but I'll have to look for other options. I don't want to continue the negotiation, because the price is still higher than I can afford. Thank you for your time. TERMINATE
name: Max Müller from Germany
